item.title: Noisy Art - Images using noise
item.description: In this article I will try to create some kind of ‘art’ using noise. For noise generating I am using my own packet: Noisy. Noisy implements Perlin noise, OpenSimplex noise and Worley noise. In this article I will use OpenSimplex noise only. Example map of OpenSimplex noise looks like that: At first I created grid with vectors. Direction of each vector is chosen using OpenSimplexNoise. Z axis of the noise changes for a bit every frame, so each frame vectors change direction for a little.
